original_text: With all his reign and his might, and the times that went over him, and over Israel, and over all the kingdoms of the countries.
korean_text: 또 그의 왕 된 일과 그의 권세와 그와 이스라엘과 온 세상 모든 나라의 지난 날의 역사가 다 기록되어 있느니라

sentences.original_text: With all his reign and his might,
and the times that went over him,
and over all the kingdoms of the countries.
